description: Application shell with navigation, breadcrumbs, and mobile sidebar - provides consistent layout and routing structure for all pages

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Sidebar MUST toggle visibility on mobile menu click
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: click menu button, verify sidebar slides in/out

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Breadcrumbs MUST update based on current pathname
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: mock pathname changes, verify breadcrumb trail

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Active navigation item MUST be highlighted
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: navigate to route, verify className includes 'bg-primary'

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Clicking overlay MUST close mobile sidebar
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: open sidebar, click overlay, verify sidebar closes

behavioralAssertions.requirement: Clicking nav link MUST close mobile sidebar
behavioralAssertions.validation: Unit test: open sidebar, click link, verify sidebar closes

outputs: Renders shell with navigation and content

features: Keyboard navigation for menu and links
